title: We are still using DOS program. Initially our DOS program works in Windows 10 Pro but can't later. How to reset the NTVDM?
body: We are still using DOS program. Initially our DOS program works in Windows 10 Pro but can't later. How to reset the NTVDM?

comments.body: Think I should include some scripts again in autoexec and config files to run our DOS programs.
DOS program execute or run if not running from Batch file.
